sources.name: GetDimRelationship
sources.script:
source(output(
		XDimID as integer,
		YDimID as integer,
		DimKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> GetDimRelationship

sources.name: TermRelationships
sources.script:
source(output(
		RelationshipID as integer,
		XTermID as integer,
		XTermDimID as integer,
		YTermID as integer,
		YTermDimID as integer,
		TermKindID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> TermRelationships

sources.name: LookupTable
sources.script:
source(output(
		TermID as integer,
		DimID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT Term.TermID, Term.DimID FROM dbo.intermediateTerm Term',
	format: 'query') ~> LookupTable

transformations.name: MergeJoin
transformations.script:
GetDimRelationship, TermRelationships join(XDimID == XTermDimID
	&& YDimID == YTermDimID
	&& DimKindID == TermKindID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeJoin

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit
transformations.script:
MergeJoin split(isNull(XTermID),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit@(Insert, UpdateDoNothing)
